SolarTracker: Funktionen um den SolarTracker zu Steuern die Sensoren zu lesen.
SolarTracker.mode: Returns the current operation mode as enum [Manually/Automatic/Remote]
SolarTracker.readSensor: Returns the sensor voltage in mV
SolarTracker.readServo:
Returns the absolute postion of the 
servo [Pan/Tilt] in degrees
SolarTracker.readSolarCell: Returns the voltage of the solarcell in mV
SolarTracker.softControl:
Returns the calculated direction to turn the Servo [Pan/Tilt]
in order to follow the (sun)light
SolarTracker.turnDirection:
Turn the tracker 
Up
Down
Left
Right
SolarTracker.writeDisplay: Write a name:value pair as a line to the display
SolarTracker.writeServoPosition: Turns the servo to the absolute position
